---
category: news
title: "‘Digital safety engineers’ give self-driving cars the need for speed"
excerpt: "Self-driving cars will travel quickly yet safely thanks to the development of AI-based ‘digital safety engineers’, according to the creators of the new system. Designed to enable autonomous journeys with no reduction in speed, the ‘dynamic risk management system’ is in development at two Fraunhofer Institutes in Germany and the University of York."
